mapper.select: SELECT id, name, img, num FROM (SELECT id,name,img,rownum as num FROM (SELECT id,name,img FROM sj_company ORDER BY id ASC )) WHERE num BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
SELECT id, name, img, num FROM (SELECT id,name,img,rownum as num FROM (SELECT id,name,img FROM sj_company WHERE name LIKE '%'||'호텔'||'%' ORDER BY id ASC )) WHERE id BETWEEN 1 AND 255
SELECT id, name, img, num FROM (SELECT id,name,img,rownum as num FROM (SELECT id,name,img FROM sj_company WHERE name LIKE '%'||'펜션'||'%' ORDER BY id ASC )) WHERE id BETWEEN 1 AND 255

SELECT id, name, img, num FROM (SELECT id,name,img,rownum as num FROM (SELECT id,name,img FROM sj_company WHERE name LIKE '%'||'하우스'||'%' OR name LIKE '%'||'집'||'%' ORDER BY id ASC )) WHERE id BETWEEN 1 AND 255

SELECT id, name, img, num FROM (SELECT id,name,img,rownum as num FROM (SELECT id,name,img FROM sj_company WHERE name NOT LIKE '%'||'집'||'%' AND name NOT LIKE '%'||'호텔'||'%' AND name NOT LIKE '%'||'펜션'||'%' AND name NOT LIKE '%'||'하우스'||'%' ORDER BY id ASC )) WHERE id BETWEEN 1 AND 255
